Past Experience

Image

Discord Bot Developer

Nordic Game

Creating an Ad-Hoc Discord Bot in Python to manage users during the first Digital Conference of Nordic Game. Creating events and activities to enable social interaction and networking between conference participants. Adapting to a quickly changing scene and designing and implementing custom-made automatic verification systems for ticket-holders, adopting online platforms in radical ways to adapt to a new global reality.

Image

Team Leader OMW

January 2019 - June 2019

Team Lead on the Game OMW. Managing a team of 7 people, working with agile methodology. OMW is a first-person horror-game set in a Nordic Country in the Early 2000s. You play as a 14-year old. Your parents won’t drive you, so you need to find your own way home from your friend’s house

August 2017 - June 2020

Game Design Major, Graphics Minor. I've learned the value of communication while working in teams. Most Projects were team oriented and related to making Games, Projects or Design Documents with students with different proficiencies.

Student Representative - responsible for providing feedback and discussing changes in the education for Graphics students. Awards: Releap (2018) at Gotland Game Conference. Awarded for special considerations towards accessibility and inclusivity.
